EmailTemplate.name: Using Template
EmailTemplate.subject: React News Case #{!Case.CaseNumber}: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Case.SuppliedName},
We would be happy to add in the news users. If you could fill out the attached excel document in its entirety and send it back at your earliest convenience, we will get started on this right away for you.
Best regards, React News Client Operations requests@reactnews.com
Green Street www.greenstreet.com www.reactnews.com The Monument Building London EC3R 8AF United Kingdom
